sentences.en: ‘I’m sure Tom’ll be here soon.’ ‘Wanna bet?’
sentences.cn: “我肯定汤姆很快就到。”“打赌吗？”

sentences.en: ‘Would you like this piece of pie?’ ‘You bet!’.
sentences.cn: “你想吃这块馅饼吗？"“当然！"。

sentences.en: ‘You can't be with me every moment.’ ‘Want to bet?’.
sentences.cn: “你不可能时刻都和我在一起。"“打不打赌？"。

sentences.en: "We'll never get a table in there"— 'Don't bet on it.'
sentences.cn: “我们在那儿是订不上座了。”——“那可不一定。”

sentences.en: a £50 bet
sentences.cn: 50英镑的赌注

sentences.en: BET shares closed just above the offer price, up 1.5p at 207p.
sentences.cn: 英国电力牵引公司的股票报收于207便士，比报出价格略涨1.5便士。

sentences.en: Bookmakers are already taking bets on the outcome.
sentences.cn: 马票商已经开始接受对比赛结果的下注了。

sentences.en: Do you always have a bet on the Grand National?
sentences.cn: 你总是对全国赛马大会下点注吗？

sentences.en: he may be a suitable companion—but don't bet on it.
sentences.cn: 他可能会是个合适的同伴——但这也难说。

sentences.en: How much do you want to bet?
sentences.cn: 你想赌多少钱？

sentences.en: I bet £10 on a horse called Premonition.
sentences.cn: 我在一匹名叫“预兆”的赛马上下了10英镑的赌注。

sentences.en: I bet Sue gave you an earful when you got home.
sentences.cn: 我敢说你到家时休肯定训了你一顿。

sentences.en: I bet you anything you like he's a pimp.
sentences.cn: 我敢打包票，他是个皮条客。

sentences.en: I bet you were good at games when you were at school.
sentences.cn: 我敢说你上学时体育很棒。

sentences.en: I'll bet they'll taste out of this world.
sentences.cn: 我敢说此味只应天上有。

sentences.en: I'll bet you walked off with my coat, too.
sentences.cn: 我打赌你还顺手拿走了我的大衣。

sentences.en: If Blythe heard that piece, I bet he was gnashing his teeth.
sentences.cn: 如果布莱思听到那个消息，我保准他会气得咬牙切齿。

sentences.en: It's my bet that he's the guy behind this killing.
sentences.cn: 我认为他就是这起凶杀案的幕后主使。

sentences.en: Jockeys are forbidden to bet on the outcome of races.
sentences.cn: 职业赛马骑师禁止对赛马结果下注。

sentences.en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentences.cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

sentences.en: My bet is that next year will be different.
sentences.cn: 我敢说明年不会这样。

sentences.en: this isn't a great time to bet the farm on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 现在不是在因特网上孤注一掷的有利时机。

sentences.en: Well, whatever he says you can bet he's thinking the opposite.
sentences.cn: 呃，不管他说什么，你都可以肯定他想的完全是另一套。

to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event
